name: Jack-o-Shadow
description:
Jack wasn't good on life, nor in death. Help him to collect souls on the living world and the purgatory so he can save his own soul from Satan.

You control Jack on the living world and his shadow on the purgatory. Both can't be  too far away from each other, as they can lose the connection.

How to play

KeyboardXBox controllerMovement of JackWASDLeft stickJump of JackSpaceLTMovement of Jack's ShadowArrow keysRight stickJump of Jack's ShadowRight CTRLRT

You can share a keyboard or a XBox controller to play with a friend!

Credits

Development: dim3, RexEngine

Game design: dim3

"Art": dim3

Music (from Open Game Art): wyver9
